name: 14 Days in Quarantine
description:
The world is suffered from a mysterious virus. Everyone is required to perform a 14 days quarantine at home with few food available. Could you survive it? 

A tiny DBG game which the player try hard to survive the food shortage during a 14 days quarantine. You can grab a card (or skip if you want) every new day. The shop will appear at day 4, 8 and 12.

Actually I'm in Shanghai under quarantine right now. So wish the world will get rid of COVID-19 in the near future.
